description: Owen Michaels is caught in a deep dream. Tied to a bed and unable to move, it would seem that this is some kind of nightmare, but with captive Wolfie Blue in control, Owen doesn't seem to be fighting it too hard. Wolfie seizes the opportunity to have his way with this tied up hunk, first teasing him with his mouth and then, when Owen is up to the hard task, mounting him and grinding on his cock. Owen must admit it feels amazing, and so he decides if you can't beat 'em, fuck 'em. So when Wolfie unties him, Owen bends Wolfie over and fucks him from behind, harder and harder with each thrust, busting his nut all over Wolfie's waiting chest. Enjoy!
title: Sweet Dreams
